plot: A Hong Kong filmmaker watches his own supernatural films on television before heading out of his apartment. Upon his return, he finds the supernatural entity from his films present in his home.
title: New Inescapable Dream
plot_es: A Hong Kong filmmaker watches his own supernatural films on television before heading out of his apartment. Upon his return, he finds the supernatural entity from his films present in his home.
plot_en: A Hong Kong filmmaker watches his own supernatural films on television before heading out of his apartment. Upon his return, he finds the supernatural entity from his films present in his home.
